Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. " Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said.
